1a3618ab-570a-4b19-9d04-b848b81f8d47.notes: @一 纲生物（如“哺乳类”或“鸟类”）@

9d60013c-b501-4663-b680-4b79a4b2dcab.notes: @一科生物（如“猫科动物”或“鹦鹉科动物”）@

c1ee6c5e-48e6-47bc-8d64-85fa278b4082.name: 特化
c1ee6c5e-48e6-47bc-8d64-85fa278b4082.notes: @一种生物（如“家猫”或“金刚鹦鹉”）@

5a9c9d0d-12d9-4ebc-8b64-b5b0945c19fb.name: 战斗反射
5a9c9d0d-12d9-4ebc-8b64-b5b0945c19fb.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

4cbe0a39-357b-4333-9e36-70b0b8fda819.name: Fit, Very
4cbe0a39-357b-4333-9e36-70b0b8fda819.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

843a9bfa-8dc6-45b4-b5ee-de2b9b24c553.name: 高痛阈
843a9bfa-8dc6-45b4-b5ee-de2b9b24c553.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

9e824b79-b1ce-4fa1-8dd4-d7595ae12889.name: 可选增益
9e824b79-b1ce-4fa1-8dd4-d7595ae12889.notes: Bonus to resist seasicknes and reduce unfamiliarity penalties for system on an appropriate boat or ship

56f1d565-904a-4b69-b9c4-7ce2c8dcf073.name: 可选增益
56f1d565-904a-4b69-b9c4-7ce2c8dcf073.notes: 在天赋对应的技能检定失败后的避免遭受伤害的 HT 检定上获得加值

98dcb96d-9594-412d-bedc-09febc64abd1.name: 健康
98dcb96d-9594-412d-bedc-09febc64abd1.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

bcd68499-b4f1-420f-a5c8-2745e5dd99b5.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人
